issue.title: Obtain Ground Truth while using SLAM

content.raw:
Replace the odometry transform you're feeding into Cartographer with the ground truth transform.

To do this you need to configuration Cartographer accordingly.  A couple hints are set `provide_odom_frame = false` and `use_odometry = true` in the `.lua` configuration file.  I recommend you check out [this example](https://bitbucket.org/jgrogers/subt_hello_world/src/development/catkin_build_ws/src/helloworld_subt_launch/config/cartographer/cartographer_3d_ekf.lua) which uses an separate node publishing an EKF odometry transform.
content.html:
Replace the odometry transform you're feeding into Cartographer with the ground truth transform.

To do this you need to configuration Cartographer accordingly. A couple hints are set provide_odom_frame = false and use_odometry = true in the .lua configuration file. I recommend you check out this example which uses an separate node publishing an EKF odometry transform.
